item.title: Embedding flexdashboard in pkgdown site
item.description: In the previous post, I demonstrated how to deploy a flexdashboard dashboard (or basically, any R Markdown format) in Github Pages. The focus of this post is on embedding flexdashboard oin pkgdown site. The pkgdown package is another great R Markdown format that enables us to quickly warp package information (documentation, vignettes, etc.) into a web format. Motivation Why would you like to embed a flexdashboard dashboard in a pkgdown site?
